name: smartthings-connector
title: SmartThings Connector
description: Integration with SmartThings to manage lights, scenes, and location modes.
author: Ingo J

commands.name: show-lights
commands.title: Show Lights
commands.description: Displays a list of lights with their current status

commands.name: show-rooms
commands.title: Show Rooms
commands.description: Displays a list of rooms with their device counts

commands.name: show-scenes
commands.title: Show Scenes
commands.description: Displays a list of scenes in the location

commands.name: show-all-devices
commands.title: Show all Devices
commands.description: Displays a list of devices in the location

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
